about_the_game:
Infected City is a first person shooter. In this game, all people have turned into zombies. You have to pick up dusty weapons and protect yourself from hordes of zombies.

In a dark first-person shooter game, you have to fight a crowd of bloodthirsty zombies! Farmer William is a brave hunter who has been tasked with exterminating the terrible zombies that have invaded your beloved city. Farmer William lives a peaceful life on his farm and knows no grief. But at some point on TV it is announced that all people have turned into zombies and are attacking other people. The worst thing for William is that his beloved wife went to the city for shopping and can be bitten by a zombie at any moment! William was not taken aback. At his service is available - the legendary weapon of this era. William takes this weapon in his hands and goes to save his wife from the hordes of zombies! He will meet a bunch of bloodthirsty zombies on his way, who will want to bite him and turn him into zombies too. Don't let them do it!

UNIQUE WORLD

In the new game Infected City, you will find yourself in a distant land, where beauty and danger are inseparable from each other. Destroy bloodthirsty zombies in picturesque places.

DISCOVER A MEMORABLE HISTORY

Dive into the dark side of human nature and meet charismatic characters and a unique story.

ADVANCED GRAPHICS AND GAMEPLAY

Infected City has very beautiful graphics and catchy gameplay!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel / AMD processor 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 (2GB) / AMD Radeon R9 270X (2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770k / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 (8GB) or AMD Radeon RX 580 (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
